long_description: Run with a little more coverage-and fun- in the stretchy Isis Corsa Skort, with its skirt on the outside, compressive knit liner shorts on the inside. Stretch waistband is constructed for optimum comfort and freedom of movement. Hidden inner pocket gives you convenient access to ID, a key or lip balm. Compressive liner shorts offer a lined gusset crotch for added freedom of movement. Closeout.
short_description: Run with a little more coverage-and fun- in the stretchy Isis Corsa Skort, with its skirt on the outside, compressive knit liner shorts on the inside.
